code: import*as request from"./requester";var baseUrl='http://localhost:3030/data/comments';export var create=function create(itemId,comment){return request.post(baseUrl,{itemId:itemId,text:comment});};export var getByItemId=function getByItemId(itemId){var relations=encodeURIComponent("user=_ownerId:users");var search=encodeURIComponent("itemId=\"".concat(itemId,"\""));return request.get("".concat(baseUrl,"?where=").concat(search,"&load=").concat(relations));};
